entry.title: Chat Widget
entry.summary: The Chat Widget is responsible to display in-game messages from other players. Widget Structure Why does it exist? Monster Hunter: Rise’s built-in chat was made for Switch and not for PC, making it really difficult to read messages and also keep track of them. entry.title: Activities Widget
entry.summary: The Activities Widget is responsible for tracking and displaying the data from side activities in the game as Submarines, Training Dojo, etc. Widget Structure Supported Actitivites Monster Hunter: Rise Submarines Training Dojo Meowmasters and other activities will be supported in the future.
